00048 void EGS_RandomGenerator::allocate(int n) {
00049     if (n < 1) {
00050         egsFatal("Attempt to construct a RNG with n < 1\n");
00051     }
00052     rarray = new EGS_Float[n];
00053     np = n;
00054     ip = np;
00055 }
00056 
00057 void EGS_RandomGenerator::copyBaseState(const EGS_RandomGenerator &r) {
00058     if (np > 0 && np != r.np) {
00059         delete [] rarray;
00060         np = 0;
00061     }
00062     if (np <= 0) {
00063         allocate(r.np);
00064     }
00065     ip = r.ip;
00066     have_x = r.have_x;
00067     the_x = r.the_x;
00068     count = r.count;
00069     for (int j=ip; j<np; j++) {
00070         rarray[j] = r.rarray[j];
00071     }
00072 }
00073 
00074 EGS_RandomGenerator::EGS_RandomGenerator(int n) : count(0), np(0) {
00075     allocate(n);
00076     have_x = false;
00077     for (int j=0; j<np; j++) {
00078         rarray[j] = 0;
00079     }
00080 }
00081 
00082 bool EGS_RandomGenerator::storeState(ostream &data) {
00083     if (!egsStoreI64(data,count)) {
00084         return false;
00085     }
00086     data << " " << np << "  " << ip << endl;
00087     for (int j=0; j<np; j++) {
00088         data << rarray[j] << " ";
00089     }
00090     data << endl;
00091     if (!data.good()) {
00092         return false;
00093     }
00094     return storePrivateState(data);
00095 }
00096 
00097 bool EGS_RandomGenerator::setState(istream &data) {
00098     if (!egsGetI64(data,count)) {
00099         return false;
00100     }
00101     int np1;
00102     data >> np1 >> ip;
00103     if (!data.good() || data.fail() || data.eof()) {
00104         return false;
00105     }
00106     if (np1 < 1) {
00107         return false;
00108     }
00109     if (np1 != np && np > 0) {
00110         delete [] rarray;
00111         rarray = new EGS_Float [np1];
00112     }
00113     np = np1;
00114     for (int j=0; j<np; j++) {
00115         data >> rarray[j];
00116     }
00117     if (!data.good()) {
00118         return false;
00119     }
00120     return setPrivateState(data);
00121 }
00122 
00123 bool EGS_RandomGenerator::addState(istream &data) {
00124     EGS_I64 count_save = count;
00125     if (!setState(data)) {
00126         return false;
00127     }
00128     count += count_save;
00129     return true;
00130 }

00137 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_Ranmar : public EGS_RandomGenerator {
00138 
00139 public:
00140 
00144     EGS_Ranmar(int ixx=1802, int jxx=9373, int n=128) :
00145         EGS_RandomGenerator(n), copy(0), high_res(false) {
00146         setState(ixx,jxx);
00147     };
00148 
00149     EGS_Ranmar(const EGS_Ranmar &r) : EGS_RandomGenerator(r),
00150         ix(r.ix), jx(r.jx), c(r.c), iseed1(r.iseed1), iseed2(r.iseed2),
00151         high_res(r.high_res) {
00152         for (int j=0; j<97; j++) {
00153             u[j] = r.u[j];
00154         }
00155     };
00156 
00157     ~EGS_Ranmar() {
00158         if (copy) {
00159             delete copy;
00160         }
00161     };
00162 
00165     void fillArray(int n, EGS_Float *array);
00166 
00168     void describeRNG() const;
00169 
00170     EGS_RandomGenerator *getCopy();
00171 
00172     void setState(EGS_RandomGenerator *r);
00173 
00174     void saveState();
00175     void resetState();
00176 
00177     int  rngSize() const {
00178         return baseSize() + 102*sizeof(int);
00179     };
00180 
00181     void setHighResolution(bool hr) {
00182         high_res = hr;
00183     };
00184 
00185 protected:
00186 
00190     bool storePrivateState(ostream &data);
00192     bool setPrivateState(istream &data);
00193 
00194     void set(const EGS_Ranmar &r) {
00195         copyBaseState(r);
00196         ix = r.ix;
00197         jx = r.jx;
00198         c = r.c;
00199         iseed1 = r.iseed1;
00200         iseed2 = r.iseed2;
00201         for (int j=0; j<97; j++) {
00202             u[j] = r.u[j];
00203         }
00204     };
00205 
00206 private:
00207 
00208     void setState(int ixx, int jxx);
00209 
00210     int        ix, jx, c;
00211     int        u[97];
00212     static     int cd, cm;
00213     static EGS_Float  twom24;
00214     int        iseed1, iseed2;
00215 
00216     bool       high_res;
00217 
00218     EGS_Ranmar *copy;
00219 
00220 };

00222 void EGS_Ranmar::saveState() {
00223     if (copy) {
00224         copy->set(*this);
00225     }
00226     else {
00227         copy = new EGS_Ranmar(*this);
00228     }
00229     copy->copy = 0;
00230 }
00231 
00232 void EGS_Ranmar::resetState() {
00233     if (copy) {
00234         EGS_Ranmar *tmp = copy;
00235         set(*copy);
00236         copy = tmp;
00237     }
00238 }
00239 
00240 EGS_RandomGenerator *EGS_Ranmar::getCopy() {
00241     EGS_Ranmar *c = new EGS_Ranmar(*this);
00242     c->np = 0;
00243     c->copy = 0;
00244     c->copyBaseState(*this);
00245     return c;
00246 }
00247 
00248 void EGS_Ranmar::setState(EGS_RandomGenerator *r) {
00249     copyBaseState(*r);
00250     EGS_Ranmar *r1 = dynamic_cast<EGS_Ranmar *>(r);
00251     if (!r1) {
00252         egsFatal("EGS_Ranmar::setState: attampt to set my state by a non EGS_Ranmar RNG!\n");
00253     }
00254     ix = r1->ix;
00255     jx = r1->jx;
00256     c = r1->c;
00257     iseed1 = r1->iseed1;
00258     iseed2 = r1->iseed2;
00259     for (int j=0; j<97; j++) {
00260         u[j] = r1->u[j];
00261     }
00262 }

00264 bool EGS_Ranmar::storePrivateState(ostream &data) {
00265     data << ix << " " << jx << " " << c << " "
00266          << iseed1 << " " << iseed2 << " " << high_res << endl;
00267     for (int j=0; j<97; j++) {
00268         data << u[j] << " ";
00269     }
00270     data <<  endl;
00271     return data.good();
00272 }
00273 
00274 bool EGS_Ranmar::setPrivateState(istream &data) {
00275     data >> ix >> jx >> c >> iseed1 >> iseed2 >> high_res;
00276     for (int j=0; j<97; j++) {
00277         data >> u[j];
00278     }
00279     return data.good();
00280 }

00282 
00283 EGS_Float EGS_Ranmar::twom24 = 1./16777216.;
00284 int EGS_Ranmar::cd = 7654321;
00285 int EGS_Ranmar::cm = 16777213;
00286 
00287 void EGS_Ranmar::describeRNG() const {
00288     egsInformation("Random number generator:\n"
00289                    "============================================\n");
00290     egsInformation("  type                = ranmar\n");
00291     egsInformation("  high resolution     = ");
00292     if (high_res) {
00293         egsInformation("yes\n");
00294     }
00295     else {
00296         egsInformation("no\n");
00297     }
00298     egsInformation("  initial seeds       = %d %d\n",iseed1,iseed2);
00299     egsInformation("  numbers used so far = %lld\n",count);
00300 }
00301 
00302 void EGS_Ranmar::setState(int ixx, int jxx) {
00303     if (ixx <= 0 || ixx >= 31328) {
00304         ixx = 1802;
00305     }
00306     if (jxx <= 0 || jxx >= 30081) {
00307         jxx = 9373;
00308     }
00309     iseed1 = ixx;
00310     iseed2 = jxx;
00311     int i = (ixx/177)%177 + 2;
00312     int j = ixx%177 + 2;
00313     int k = (jxx/169)%178 + 1;
00314     int l = jxx%169;
00315 
00316     for (int ii=0; ii<97; ii++) {
00317         int s = 0;
00318         int t = 8388608;
00319         for (int jj=0; jj<24; jj++) {
00320             int m = (((i*j)%179)*k)%179;
00321             i = j;
00322             j = k;
00323             k = m;
00324             l = (53*l+1)%169;
00325             if ((l*m)%64 >= 32) {
00326                 s += t;
00327             }
00328             t /= 2;
00329         }
00330         u[ii] = s;
00331     }
00332     c = 362436;
00333     ix = 96;
00334     jx = 32;
00335 }
00336 
00337 void EGS_Ranmar::fillArray(int n, EGS_Float *array) {
00338     for (int ii=0; ii<n; ii++) {
00339         register int r = u[ix] - u[jx--];
00340 #ifdef MSVC
00341         if (r > 16777219) {
00342             egsWarning("r = %d\n",r);
00343         }
00344 #endif
00345         if (r < 0) {
00346             r += 16777216;
00347         }
00348         u[ix--] = r;
00349         if (ix < 0) {
00350             ix = 96;
00351         }
00352         if (jx < 0) {
00353             jx = 96;
00354         }
00355         c -= cd;
00356         if (c < 0) {
00357             c+=cm;
00358         }
00359         r -= c;
00360         if (r < 0) {
00361             r+=16777216;
00362         }
00363 #ifdef MSVC
00364         if (r > 16777219) {
00365             egsWarning("r = %d\n",r);
00366         }
00367 #endif
00368         array[ii] = twom24*r;
00369     }
00370     if (high_res) {
00371         for (int ii=0; ii<n; ii++) {
00372             register int r = u[ix] - u[jx--];
00373 #ifdef MSVC
00374             if (r > 16777219) {
00375                 egsWarning("r = %d\n",r);
00376             }
00377 #endif
00378             if (r < 0) {
00379                 r += 16777216;
00380             }
00381             u[ix--] = r;
00382             if (ix < 0) {
00383                 ix = 96;
00384             }
00385             if (jx < 0) {
00386                 jx = 96;
00387             }
00388             c -= cd;
00389             if (c < 0) {
00390                 c+=cm;
00391             }
00392             r -= c;
00393             if (r < 0) {
00394                 r+=16777216;
00395             }
00396 #ifdef MSVC
00397             if (r > 16777219) {
00398                 egsWarning("r = %d\n",r);
00399             }
00400 #endif
00401             array[ii] += twom24*twom24*r;
00402         }
00403     }
00404     count += n;
00405 }

00408 EGS_RandomGenerator *EGS_RandomGenerator::createRNG(EGS_Input *input,
00409         int sequence) {
00410     if (!input) {
00411         egsWarning("EGS_RandomGenerator::createRNG: null input?\n");
00412         return 0;
00413     }
00414     EGS_Input *i;
00415     bool delete_it = false;
00416     if (input->isA("rng definition")) {
00417         i = input;
00418     }
00419     else {
00420         i = input->takeInputItem("rng definition");
00421         if (!i) {
00422             egsWarning("EGS_RandomGenerator::createRNG: no 'RNG definition'"
00423                        " input\n");
00424             return 0;
00425         }
00426         delete_it = true;
00427     }
00428     string type;
00429     int err = i->getInput("type",type);
00430     if (err) {
00431         egsWarning("EGS_RandomGenerator::createRNG: no RNG type specified\n"
00432                    "  Assuming ranmar.\n");
00433         type = "ranmar";
00434     }
00435     EGS_RandomGenerator *result;
00436     if (i->compare(type,"ranmar")) {
00437         vector<int> seeds;
00438         err = i->getInput("initial seeds",seeds);
00439         EGS_Ranmar *res;
00440         if (!err && seeds.size() == 2) {
00441             res = new EGS_Ranmar(seeds[0],seeds[1] + sequence);
00442         }
00443         else {
00444             res = new EGS_Ranmar(1802,9373+sequence);
00445         }
00446         vector<string> hr_options;
00447         hr_options.push_back("no");
00448         hr_options.push_back("yes");
00449         bool hr = i->getInput("high resolution",hr_options,0);
00450         res->setHighResolution(hr);
00451         result = res;
00452     }
00453     else {
00454         egsWarning("EGS_RandomGenerator::createRNG: unknown RNG type %s\n",
00455                    type.c_str());
00456         result = 0;
00457     }
00458     if (delete_it) {
00459         delete i;
00460     }
00461     return result;
00462 }
00463 
00464 EGS_RandomGenerator *EGS_RandomGenerator::defaultRNG(int sequence) {
00465     sequence += 97;
00466     int ixx = 33;
00467     int iaux = sequence/30081;
00468     int jxx = sequence - iaux*30081;
00469     if (iaux > 0) {
00470         ixx += iaux;
00471         if (iaux > 31328) egsFatal("EGS_RandomGenerator::defaultRNG: "
00472                                        "sequence %d is outside of allowed range\n",sequence);
00473     }
00474     return new EGS_Ranmar(ixx,jxx);
00475 }
